results.logicSynthesis.logic.truthtable

Class States<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • results.logicSynthesis.logic.truthtable.States<T>

  • public class States<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    The State class contains all the state of a netlist used within the SimulatedAnnealing algorithm class of the technologyMapping stage.
    Author:
    Vincent Mirian
    Date:
    Today

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      States(java.util.List<T> inputs, java.lang.Boolean One, java.lang.Boolean Zero)
      Initializes a newly created States with the list of inputs defined by parameter inputs the True value defined by parameter One, the false value defined by parameter Zero,.

        Returns the State at the specified position in this instance.
        Parameters:
        index - index of the State to return
        Returns:
